verses.verse: And this was the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; for he was the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>. As for <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1060>first-born<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, because he was a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, therefore he had <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

So the lot was for the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>: for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2507>Helek<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H844>Asriel<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7928>Shechem<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8061>Shemida<s%>: these were the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> according to their <S%H4940>families<s%>.

But <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, had no <S%H1121>sons<s%>, but <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: and these are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: <S%H4244>Mahlah<s%>, and <S%H5270>Noah<s%>, <S%H2295>Hoglah<s%>, <S%H4435>Milcah<s%>, and <S%H8656>Tirzah<s%>.

And they came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>princes<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> our <S%H251>brethren<s%>: therefore according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%>.

And there <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2256>parts<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, besides the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, which is <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>;

because the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H5157>had<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%>. And the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> belonged unto the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was from <S%H836>Asher<s%> to <S%H4366>Michmethath<s%>, which is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>; and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H1980>along<s%> to the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, unto the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5887>En-tappuah<s%>.

The <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> belonged to <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>; but <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> on the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> belonged to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>.

And the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H5158>brook<s%> of <S%H7071>Kanah<s%>, <S%H5045>southward<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%>: these <S%H5892>cities<s%> belonged to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: and the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> was on the north <S%H6828>side<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook<s%>, and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out thereof were at the <S%H3220>sea<s%>:

southward <S%H5045><s%> it was <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>'s, and <S%H6828>northward<s%> it was <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>'s, and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> was his <S%H1366>border<s%>; and they <S%H6293>reached<s%> to <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the <S%H6828>north<s%>, and to <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> on the <S%H4217>east<s%>.

And <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had in <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and in <S%H836>Asher<s%> <S%H1052>Beth-shean<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5874>En-dor<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, even the <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5316>heights<s%>.

Yet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the inhabitants of those <S%H5892>cities<s%>; but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in that <S%H776>land<s%>.

And it came to <S%H1121>pass<s%>, when the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were waxed <S%H2388>strong<s%>, that they <S%H5414>put<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to <S%H4522>taskwork<s%>, and did not <S%H3423>utterly<s%> drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Why hast thou <S%H5414>given<s%> me but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2256>part<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, seeing I am a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, forasmuch <S%H5704>as<s%> <S%H3541>hitherto<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath blessed <S%H1288>me<s%>?

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7227>them<s%>, If thou be a great <S%H5971>people<s%>, get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, and cut <S%H1254>down<s%> for thyself there in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> and of the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>; since the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is too narrow for <S%H213>thee<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> is not <S%H4672>enough<s%> for <S%H3669>us<s%>: and all the Canaanites that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> have <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, both they who are in <S%H1052>Beth-shean<s%> and its <S%H1323>towns<s%>, and they who are in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, even to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and to <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thou art a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>, and hast <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%>; thou shalt not have <S%H259>one<s%> lot <S%H1486>only<s%>:

but the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%> shall be <S%H3293>thine<s%>; for though it is a forest, thou shalt cut it <S%H1254>down<s%>, and the <S%H8444>goings<s%> out thereof shall be <S%H3423>thine<s%>; for thou shalt drive out the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, though they have <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%>, and though they are <S%H2389>strong<s%>.
